backend/main.mo: Defines actor types for moods, chat, analytics, user data, market data, storage, and utility modules used across the backend.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking frontend files and components to required backend integration and React Query hook work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of each major frontend file and component, describing their roles and current placeholder behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-driven theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST.md: Outlines steps for verifying app startup, login flows, navigation, and fallback behaviors in smoke testing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application handling authentication, startup states, routing between pages, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied message with an admin restriction notice and a back button.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: Placeholder AI companion UI with a back button and a message indicating backend dependency.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Shows an analytics dashboard placeholder, restricting access to admins and offering a back button.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Provides guest login creation, logs the event, and offers Internet Identity login as an alternative.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: Admin-only placeholder screen for app market settings with a back button.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Displays a placeholder group chat room view with a back button.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing navigation cards and weekly mood summary, loading data from hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with dynamic links, authentication controls, and admin menu options.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Loads and displays a list of past mood entries with timestamps and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Allows users to record their current mood with notes and submit the entry to the backend.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Admin-only placeholder screen for viewing presentations with a back button.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Displays a placeholder private chat interface with a back button.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorStat: Displays a startup error message with details and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/StartupTimeoutFa: Shows a timeout fallback UI with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Placeholder component showing weekly mood insights with a back button.
frontend/src/hooks/guestAuthStore.ts: Manages guest sessions with localStorage persistence and subscription updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides functions to log login, navigation, and interaction events via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Checks admin status and logs when an authenticated user is not an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: React hook for accessing and managing guest sessions through guestAuthStore.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, context, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for admin checks, profiles, mood data, and activity logging; many are placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks session duration and periodically logs activity, including on unload.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes, plus global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/adminMoodAnalytics.ts: Provides utilities for mapping moods to emojis/colors and computing daily mood counts and weekly averages.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Validates AI responses by blocking diagnostic or therapeutic claims.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Empty placeholder file for AI response generation.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Selects conversation stage based on message content and session context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages session context storage, initialization, loading, saving, and clearing.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines response templates per conversation stage and a helper to select one.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Adapts template text by replacing placeholders and detecting simple emotions.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Contains conversation stage type definitions and the SessionContext interface.
frontend/src/lib/appStorage.ts: Clears SafeSpace-specific localStorage and sessionStorage keys.
frontend/src/lib/linearRegression.ts: Implements basic linear regression and prediction on point data.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/emotionDetect: Detects basic emotions from text using keyword matching.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/engagement.ts: Computes a simple engagement score based on exchange count.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/nudges.ts: Provides supportive nudge messages and logic for when to show them.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/sessionUX.ts: Manages MindfulAI UI state in session storage with load/save helpers.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/types.ts: Defines emotion data and MindfulAIState interfaces.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Classifies errors into mood-related categories based on message content.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utilities for converting, formatting, and handling bigint nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Generates mood labels and insight text based on average mood scores.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Helpers for computing the current week range, listing week days, and checking week membership.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended backend data types including moods, mood entries, user records, chat structures, and analytics models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography and UI transitions.
project_state.json: Describes the project's restoration goals, known issues, and feature requirements for rebuilding the SafeSpace backend.
